column1: Little Goat Diner////YUM....just yum. This place is great
column2: I have yet to have a bad meal.  Service is excellent.  My only complaint is that they look my favorite thing off the menu.....Stephanie
column5: please bring back the bbq pulled pork!!!  It's so damn good!!!  Tred the crispy pork belly this last time last week and it didn't disappoint!!  Mac and cheese is the bomb too!!
